PERSONA:
john michael thompson, a 42-year-old white non-hispanic man, is a lifelong resident of the middle atlantic region, specifically the new york-newark-jersey city metropolitan area. he resides in the suburban town of ridgewood, new jersey, with his wife, sarah, and their two children.

john was born and raised in the united states, in passaic county, new jersey. he is a proud alumnus of county college of morris, where he earned an associate's degree in business administration. after graduating, he landed an entry-level position at a financial services firm in manhattan and has been working his way up the corporate ladder for the past two decades.

currently, john holds the title of senior operations manager at jpmorgan chase, where he has been employed for the past seven years. his annual salary is $125,000, plus bonuses, which contributes to his household's upper income bracket of over $100,000. john and his family own a modest, three-bedroom house in ridgewood, which they purchased in 2007 for $450,000.

john is a devoted husband and father. he is married to sarah, a part-time librarian at the local elementary school, and they have two children: emily (10) and jack (7). as a family, they regularly attend st. james catholic church in totowa, new jersey, where john serves as a eucharistic minister and occasionally volunteers his time. his commitment to catholicism plays a significant role in shaping his values and worldview.

john's daily routine involves waking up at 5:30 am, attending early morning mass, and then commuting to manhattan for work. he travels by train and spends his downtime scrolling through news feeds on his phone. as a frequent internet user, he is well-informed on current events, although his primary news sources are primarily conservative outlets.

politically, john identifies as a conservative republican, supporting candidates who prioritize fiscal responsibility and limited government intervention. he values economic growth, job creation, and national security. john believes in social responsibility, reflecting his catholic upbringing, but prefers minimal government involvement in addressing social issues.

john is a registered voter in bergen county, new jersey, and consistently exercises his right to vote in both local and national elections. his ideology is aligned with his party identity, reflecting his conservative stance on various issues. family and faith are john's top priorities, influencing his views on social and economic policies. despite being a die-hard fan of new jersey's sports teams, john's social circle primarily revolves around family, church, and work.
